content: do you have little faces that need scrubbing dishes that need washing and near constant spills that need wiping up clean up messes in style with this dainty washcloth that gets the job done it ll leave you looking good while it takes all your dirt now who couldn t use a dishcloth like that for mothers of all shapes sizes ages and ethnicities <3 we love you ***this crochet pattern is available for free on my website or you can download it here as a print-optimized ad-free pdf for your convenience *** **difficulty ** easy **materials needed ** 4 5mm hook or hook needed to obtain measurements 75 yards of lily sugar n cream cotton yarn in ecru yarn needle scissors a mother you know and love **stitches used ** chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet st/sts = stitch/stitches space/sps = space/spaces prev = previous **additional terms ** stitching in the 3rd loop of half_double_crochet after turning work all stitches for that row in the 3rd loop of the half_double_crochet from previous row it will be in the front instructions look at the top of the stitch and locate the sideways v bend the stitch to look at the back and you should see another v you ll be working into the back loop of that v this is called the 3rd loop **gauge ** these dishcloths are gauged in love **measurements ** 9 x 9 **additional notes ** -chain 2 does not count as first stitch of row in this particular version of the pattern
